title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Chat with local LLMs from Python scripts or notebooks.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama. Run in Docker, manage models, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Simple fluent API, streaming, async, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama. Idiomatic Ruby client with streaming chat and model management.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama powered by prompt_toolkit; history, themes, keybindings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama. Use local LLMs as generators or chatters in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host a Discord bot powered by any Ollama model; slash commands, threads, moderation.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda 8 connector that invokes Ollama models inside BPMN processes for AI tasks.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: Custom n8n node to call Ollama models in workflows. Supports chat, generate, embeddings.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma. Ingest PDFs, query with local embeddings.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a fluent wrapper around Ollama’s API with queue and cache support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama. Async/tokio, strong typing, model streaming.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt desktop GUI for Ollama. Model manager, chat window, dark/light themes.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go SDK for Ollama. Small surface, context cancellations, streaming JSON.
